name: bear hooded cowl
notes:
**size**
1-4 years (4-10 years) 10+ years

**measurements**
width: 20 (25) 30 cm / 8 (10) 12 inch
length: 34 (38.5) 43 cm / 13 (15) 17 inch 

**materials**
2 (2) 2 skeins of fluffy day xl col. 13

**hook**
crochet hook 7 mm (k/l)

**yarn quality**
fluffy day xl, hobbii
100% acrylic
100 g (3.5 oz) = 140 m (153 yds)

**gauge**
10 sts x 9 rows = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4” x 4”

**pattern information**
this beginner friendly pattern is worked in rounds of hdc, followed by rows of hdc. the top is slip stitched together and the ears are sewn on afterwards. the pattern contains written instructions per round/row and total stitch counts for each round/row.
